description: Zoho Campaigns is an email marketing platform for managing mailing lists, sending campaigns, tracking engagement, and automating subscriber workflows.

actions.name: addContactToMailingList
actions.description: Add contacts to your mailing lists.

actions.name: addTagToContact
actions.description: Apply a tag to a contact by email. Creates the tag if it doesn't exist.

actions.name: addUpdateContact
actions.description: Add a new contact or update an existing one. Confirmation email sent based on mailing list settings.

actions.name: cloneCampaign
actions.description: Clone an existing campaign, optionally renaming.

actions.name: createCampaign
actions.description: Create a new campaign with campaign name, subject, topic, sender name/address, and mailing list.

actions.name: findCampaign
actions.description: Locate an existing campaign by campaign name.

actions.name: findContact
actions.description: Look up an existing contact by email address.

actions.name: removeTag
actions.description: Remove a tag from a contact.

actions.name: sendCampaign
actions.description: Send a campaign that has been created or cloned.

actions.name: unsubscribeContact
actions.description: Remove a contact from a mailing list.

triggers.name: newCampaign
triggers.description: Fires when a new campaign is created.

triggers.name: newContact
triggers.description: Fires when a new contact is added to a selected mailing list.

triggers.name: unsubscribe
triggers.description: Fires when a contact is removed from a mailing list or unsubscribed.
